member.name: T:AssemblyInfoUtil.Program
member.summary: Class Program defines the entry point routine of a Console application.

member.name: M:AssemblyInfoUtil.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Static method Main is the entry point routine of a Console application.
member.param: Main MAY accept the command line arguments as an array of strings, which MAY be empty, but never NULL.

member.name: M:AssemblyInfoUtil.Program.CheckCopyrightYear(System.String)
member.summary: When static Boolean object member s_FixCopyrightYear is TRUE, caller ProcessLinePart returns through this method to look after the copyright year (AssemblyCopyright) attribute.
member.param: Calling method ProcessLinePart passes in the string that it is about to return to its caller, ProcessLine, so that it can process the AssemblyCopyright attribute.
member.returns: Unless the string is the AssemblyCopyright attribute, the input is returned unchanged. Otherwise, the AssemblyCopyright is parsed for a date range, which, if found, is updated to the current year per the system clock.

member.name: M:AssemblyInfoUtil.Program.DisplayHelpAndSetStatusCode(System.Int32)
member.summary: Display a short help message and return the status code specified in .
member.param: This signed integer receives the status code to return to the operating system.

member.name: M:AssemblyInfoUtil.Program.HandleAssemblyInformationalVersion(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})

summary.para: Do whatever is needed to implement AssemblyInformationalVersion.
If one exists and the FileVersion string was updated, update it with the new FileVersion string.
If there isn't one yet and an updated FileVersion string exists, create it and initialize it with the current FileVersion string.

member.param: Like the routine that calls it, this routine needs to see the whole list of assembly attributes.

member.name: M:AssemblyInfoUtil.Program.OK2Proceed
member.summary: Evaluate the s_OnlyWhenModified flag, which is TRUE when command line argument -onlywhenmodified is present. When it is, return TRUE only when at least one file in the directory that contains the AssemblyInfo.cs file specified in the command line or its immediate parent is newer than AssemblyInfo.cs or has its Archive flag set.

member.name: M:AssemblyInfoUtil.Program.ParseCommandLineArgs(System.String[])
member.summary: Parse the command line arguments received by the calling main routine, storing their values in class-scoped static members.
member.param: This array of strings returns the array of strings received by the main routine from the operating system.
member.returns: This method returns TRUE when all command line arguments are valid and the input file specified therein as a positional parameter exists.

member.name: M:AssemblyInfoUtil.Program.PerformTask
member.summary: The main routine calls this routine to perform the task(s) specified by the command line switches. Its inputs are object-scoped static members.

member.name: M:AssemblyInfoUtil.Program.ProcessLine(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Int32)
member.summary: This method is called once for each line in the input AssemblyInfo.
member.param: This argument receives a reference to the generic List of strings that holds the contents of the AsseemblyInfo file.
This argument receives a copy of the current indes into the List of assembly attribute strings.
member.returns: The return value is the input string, modified as dictated by its contents and the object-scoped static members that are set according to the command line arguments.

member.name: M:AssemblyInfoUtil.Program.ProcessLinePart(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The ProcessLine method calls this string, passing in a copy of the whole input line as and the prefix that identifies its place in the collection of AssemblyInfo attributes, which comes in as . This routine is dedicated to processing AssemblyVersion attributes.
member.param: This string argument receives a copy of the entire line as read from the input AssemblyInfo.cs file.
This string argument receives a copy of the prefix that identifies the assembly attribute represented by the whole line passed in as .

returns.para: This method returns the string to write into the AssemblyInfo.cs file being built in the temporary output file that will eventually replace the input file.
When static object member s_FixCopyrightYear is TRUE, this method returns through CheckCopyrightYear, another method that handles the independent task of fixing up the copyright year.

member.name: M:AssemblyInfoUtil.Program.ReportSettings
member.summary: The main routine calls this method to display the command line options. Its inputs are defined as object-scoped static members.

member.name: M:AssemblyInfoUtil.Program.SemVerStringFromFileVersionString(System.String)
member.summary: Generate a Semantic Version (SemVer) version string from a 4-part FileVersion string.
member.param: This string is a copy of the FileVersion string from which to derive a SemVer string.
member.returns: The return value is a SemVer string.

member.name: M:AssemblyInfoUtil.Utl.AwaitCarbonUnit
member.summary: Prompt the user to press the RETURN key to end the program, allowing it to be launched from the File Explorer.

member.name: M:AssemblyInfoUtil.Utl.CreateShutdownBanner
member.summary: Generate a shutdown message that reports the name of the calling program, the current time per the system clock, and the wall clock time consumed by the program.
member.returns: The return value is a string that can be displayed on the console or recorded in a log file.

member.name: M:AssemblyInfoUtil.Utl.CreateStartupBanner
member.summary: Create a startup message that reports the name and version (major and minor) of the calling program and the current time per the system clock.
member.returns: The return value is a string that can be displayed on the console or recorded in a log file.

member.name: M:AssemblyInfoUtil.Utl.PrettyTrace(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Format a stack trace so that it prints with subsequent entries aligned under the first entry.
member.param: Count of leading spaces to insert between trace items
member.returns: Pretty stack trace for printing vertically alinged

member.name: T:AssemblyInfoUtil.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:AssemblyInfoUtil.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:AssemblyInfoUtil.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:AssemblyInfoUtil.Properties.Resources.ERRMSG_VERSION_STRING_PARTS_COUNT
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {4}The format of the version string fed into method {0} is invalid.{4} The expected number of version substrings is {1}.{4} The actual number of substrings is {2}.{4} The version string is {3}.{4}.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Error: The version substring at position {0} is invalid.{2} Version substring = {1}{2}.
